titles.title: A joint resolution to prohibit the introduction of U.S. combat troops into Honduras or Nicaragua.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 3/17/1988--Introduced. Prohibits the introduction of any member of the U.S. armed forces or any Government employee into Honduras or Nicaragua to engage (directly or indirectly) in combat unless: (1) the Congress has declared war or authorized the presence of such forces in advance by a joint resolution signed by the President; or (2) the President has determined that the presence of such forces is necessary to protect American lives, to provide for the immediate evacuation of U.S. citizens, or to respond to a clear and present danger of military attack on the United States.
